mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Q_BOARD (NICKNAME, TITLE, CONTENT, PW, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, HIT, IP) VALUES (#{nickname}, #{title}, #{content}, #{pw}, NOW(), NOW(), 0, #{ip})
mapper.select: SELECT QA_NO as qaNo, U.NICKNAME as nickname, TITLE as title, CONTENT as content, PW as pw, CREATE_DATE as createDate, MODIFY_DATE as modifyDate, HIT as hit, IP as ip FROM USERS U INNER JOIN Q_BOARD Q ON U.NICKNAME = Q.NICKNAME WHERE Q.QA_NO = #{qaNo}

SELECT A.ROW_NUM, A.QA_NO, A.NICKNAME, A.TITLE, A.CONTENT, A.PW, A.CREATE_DATE, A.MODIFY_DATE, A.HIT, A.IP, CASE WHEN A.CREATE_DATE >= NOW()-7 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END as NEW_YN FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY QA_NO DESC) AS ROW_NUM, B.QA_NO, B.NICKNAME, B.TITLE, B.CONTENT, B.PW, B.CREATE_DATE, B.MODIFY_DATE, B.HIT, B.IP, U.USER_NO, U.ID, U.NAME FROM USERS U INNER JOIN Q_BOARD B ON U.NICKNAME = B.NICKNAME) A WHERE A.ROW_NUM BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
